question: A fruit that keeps the doctor away if eaten daily
A fruit that is yellow and is a good source of potassium
A fruit that is red and is a good source of vitamin C
A fruit that is green and is a good source of vitamin K
A fruit that is orange and is a good source of vitamin A
A fruit that is purple and is a good source of vitamin B6
A fruit that is brown and is a good source of vitamin E
A fruit that is white and is a good source of vitamin B9
A fruit that is black and is a good source of vitamin B12
A fruit that is pink and is a good source of vitamin B1
